titles.title: The Shawshank Redemption
titles.overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison.

titles.title: The Godfather
titles.overview: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family.

titles.title: Inception
titles.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is offered a chance to have his criminal record erased.

titles.title: Parasite
titles.overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

titles.title: Spirited Away
titles.overview: A young girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits where humans are changed into beasts.

titles.title: Interstellar
titles.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

titles.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
titles.overview: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure where she must connect different versions of herself across the multiverse.

titles.title: Pulp Fiction
titles.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

titles.title: The Dark Knight
titles.overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests.

titles.title: Dune: Part Two
titles.overview: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

titles.title: Past Lives
titles.overview: Nora and Hae Sung, two childhood friends, are reunited in New York for one fateful week as they confront notions of love and destiny.

titles.title: Poor Things
titles.overview: The incredible tale of the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant Dr. Godwin Baxter.

titles.title: Oppenheimer
titles.overview: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer's role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

titles.title: The Holdovers
titles.overview: A cranky history teacher at a prep school is forced to remain on campus over the holidays with a troubled student who has no place to go.

titles.title: Barbie
titles.overview: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to question her world and her existence.

titles.title: Breaking Bad
titles.overview: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer turns to manufacturing meth to secure his family's future.

titles.title: The Bear
titles.overview: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.

titles.title: Severance
titles.overview: Mark leads a team of office workers whose memories have been surgically divided between their work and personal lives.

titles.title: Sh≈çgun
titles.overview: In Japan in the year 1600, a mysterious European ship is found marooned in a small fishing village.

titles.title: The Last of Us
titles.overview: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.
